caption.title: The locations of reported Ebola virus infection in animals in Africa.
caption.p: ( A) Shows the locations of reported Ebola virus infection in animals. ( Bâ€“ D) Show these records in animals over three different time periods. Numbers refer to records as listed in Table 2. In all panels, the species in which infection was detected is given by symbol shape and the year recorded by symbol colour. Blue countries represent locations where zoonotic transmission to humans has been reported or is assumed to have occurred. In each map the Democratic Republic of Congo is outlined for reference.
